column4: Where did my files go? They were there yesterday, but today they're showing up with permissions of "?---------" and ls is coloring them red on black. And I haven't done anything to them...
boot to a LiveCD and run fsck
weird, you may wish to use testdisk
will either of those check my hard drive's health?
they will attempt to recover files
The data being gone ain't that important. I've backups... I kinda wanna know why it left. :p
you can check syslog and co. perhaps
for HDD health check, what hard drive? your hdd manfacturer should have a health checking tool
I don't know... Whatever dell was using when it slapped this laptop together.
mm, fsck is supposed to be it, but I guess you could use something like SpinRite (find a copy in P2P or w/e)
Apparently it's a Hitachi... I'll look for a tool from them or see if I can borrow SpinRite from a friend. Thanks for the help.
